revised_title: Obituary of Ernest Harold Farmer: A Pioneering Organic Chemist
tldr: Ernest Harold Farmer was a prominent organic chemist who made significant contributions to the understanding of tautomerism, conjugated unsaturated systems, and polymerization. He also played a crucial role in the development of rubber research and the British Rubber Producers' Research Association. Despite facing physical challenges due to a war injury, Farmer remained an active and influential researcher throughout his life.
